item.title: Flags have been fixed to two lampposts either side of Majestic Wines, 17th October
item.description:
Fixing flags and other items to lampposts without the permission of the landowner is illegal. It is also a potential hazard to road users as they are not in proper fittings for flags. These flags have been present for more than a week.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Willow Grove, Chislehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping, 17th October
item.description:
It looks like the contents of an entire flat was emptied out on the street yesterday in front of the blocks bin. It is the blocking the sidewalk. Other rubbish including food waste has subsequently been added to the pile increasing by the risk of vermin.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Richmond Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Car parked on pavement illegally, 17th October
item.description:
The car was parked on the pavement illegally blocking people from getting past especially wheelchair users or people who have disability scooters or parents with push chairs or prams.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ordnance Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Waste dumped in Craig's Court, 17th October
item.description:
Waste dumped all over Craigâ€™s Court - bin bags crushed glass urine feces drugs.... whyis this tolerated? we want less bins - surely some of them can be moved to commercial area !? fine the businesses and individuals who fly tip, move street cleaner elsewhere- don't the residents deserve to have the public realm just outside our homes washed properly at least once per year !?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 33, Whitehall, Waterloo, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Motorbike Abandoned, 17th October
